name: Icehockeyreferee Story Simulation
description:
Icehockeyreferee Story Simulation 

You slip into the role of an icehockeyreferee. Try to  solve some situations a real referee needs to decide in  a fraction of seconds.

Are you brave enough ?

Try it now and step on the ice!

This game was made for the ''I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story'' gamejam.

Things to add: 

- justify the decision with the official rules. 

- small extensions to the story

- gramatical corections
